forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 59. West wind around 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

weather_report:
As the afternoon sun graces Downtown San Francisco, the skyline glimmers beneath a veil of transient clouds, casting a tranquil charm on the bustling streets. With temperatures hovering around a brisk 59 degrees, the west winds weave playfully through the city, creating an invigorating atmosphere. For the moment, fog may dance in the distance, hinting at its maritime friends lurking just beyond the Golden Gate, while the city itself enjoys a brief respite from the usual foggy embrace. 

As evening approaches, the clouds will thicken, dropping the mercury to a cozy 52 degrees. The anticipated precipitation carries a gentle promise of moisture, a reminder that the delicate dance of nature is ever-shifting. It would be wise to layer up with a light jacket, perhaps even a scarf, to savor the coolness and prepare for what the night may hold. An ideal way to embrace this evening would be a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, savoring the views of the bay as it glistens under the fading light, or perhaps settling into a local café for a warm drink while capturing the vibrant pulse of the city as it transitions from day to night.
